data.title: Elite Auto Sounds & Home Theater
data.meta_description: Elite Auto Sounds & Home Theater is proudly servicing areas including Bulverde, San Antonio, New Braunfels, San Marcos, and more.
data.text:
SERVICE AREAS

SERVICE AREAS

Out of the many car audio and window tinting companies in New Braunfels, Elite Auto Sounds & Home Theater is the New Braunfels audio, tint and alarm company of choice. Elite Auto Sounds & Home Theater provides products and installation services for both your home and vehicle. Elite Auto Sounds & Home Theater is fully insured and offers a lifetime warranty on all installations as well as manufacturer’s warranty on all equipment and components.

Elite Auto Sounds & Home Theater provides audio & video services to clients in the Texas Hill Country with exceptional customer service. All Elite Auto Sounds & Home Theater installers are very experienced and will perform your installation with care and attention to detail. Both home and vehicle services are available. Our team is very passionate about quality sound and takes great pride in their craft

Elite Auto Sounds & Home Theater provides audio and video installation for your home or business. Services are available in Boerne, Blanco, Leon Springs, Fair Oaks and surrounding areas. As a full-service home theater company, we are fully insured and offer services such as television (flatscreen) mounting, outdoor and patio speakers, volume control, whole home automation, surround sound, pre-wiring, and other commercial services. A lifetime warranty applies to all installations and all products carry a manufacturer’s warranty.
